headline: Digital Supply Chain & Logistics Tech Research Report 2026: A $146.92 Billion Market by 2031 from $72 Billion in 2025 with SAP, Oracle, Blue Yonder, DHL, and Schneider Electric Leading
summary: The Digital Supply Chain & Logistics Tech Market is anticipated to grow from USD 72 Billion in 2025 to USD 146.92 Billion by 2031, at a CAGR of 12.62%. Key trends driving this growth include advancements in robotics and warehouse automation, such as Amazon's Vulcan, and the rise of collaborative logistics networks, illustrated by Bosch’s Supply Chain Studio. headline: Telemedicine & Digital Health Research Report 2026: A $180 Billion Market by 2031 from $85.5 Billion in 2025 with Teladoc Health, Amwell, Philips, Siemens Healthineers, GE, Medtronic, Oracle Leading
summary: The Telemedicine & Digital Health Market, valued at USD 85.50 billion in 2025, is projected to reach USD 180.00 billion by 2031, growing at a CAGR of 13.21%. Key growth drivers include AI, ML, IoT integration, and the expansion of robust digital infrastructure and smartphone penetration, enhancing access and personalized care.
